name: reactree-rails-dev
description: ReAcTree Rails development with multi-agent orchestration, LSP-powered context compilation, Guardian validation cycle for type safety, Solargraph/Sorbet/Rubocop integration with blocking quality gates, requirements translation (user stories to beads tasks), Pre/Post edit validation hooks, parallel execution, dual memory systems with 24h TTL caching, iterative control flow (LOOP, CONDITIONAL), backwards communication (FEEDBACK edges), Claude CLI intelligent intent detection with manifest-based agent/skill discovery, utility agents, UX Engineer, optimized model selection, and comprehensive skills library for A+ type-safe code
